title: How to take India towards an electric vehicles future
text:
How to take India towards an electric vehicles future More

The Indian government has set ambitious targets to accelerate the adoption of electric vehicles (EVs). Incentives are also being offered to make carmakers develop new EV models and manufacturing components such as lithium-ion batteries and electric motors. “India has a problem with policymaking, where someone can come up with a great idea and it will get lost in transition before it reaches the right person,” Arunabha Ghosh, CEO of Council on Energy, Environment and Water, a think tank.
